mention.text: The operation of 11 GPS -LRB- Global Positioning System -RRB- stations
the operation of civilian smart phones ; navigators and other devices that ordinary Russians use
the GPS stations which could stop their operation on June 1
system designed and operated by the U.S. Department of Defence
